    • getCarbonFootprint

      public double getCarbonFootprint()
      Overriding the getCarbonFootprint() method of the interface I estimate that per units of energy consumed by a house over X period of time, we attribute 0.4kg CO2 I allow the value to be negative, an energy of excess can be possible e.g. tiny house, no pool, no AC, uses electric heating
      Specified by:
      getCarbonFootprint in interface CarbonFootprint
      Returns:
      carbonFootprint
